text:
John Gordon (19 November 1925 – 20 November 2017) was an English writer of supernatural fiction. He wrote fifteen fantasy novels (including "The Giant Under The Snow"), four short story collections, over fifty short stories and a teenage memoir. He was born in Jarrow, Tyne & Wear.
Gordon died on 20 November 2017 at his Norwich, Norfolk home of Alzheimer's disease at the age of 92.
